name: Crocro Gallery and Media
description:
Gallery for you Crocro mode creations!

go to Cookie for your Camera photo's and video's

Go to beaver for your drawings

Go to bird for your voice recordings

Go to Crocro for your added Media

if you don't have it The characters will shock (except bird for some reason and crocro will not appear, instead nocontents appears)

To add media you need to have the Crocro Mode app and add them in the settings.
